name: Willie E. POLITE, Allen Ginn, Gregory Stover, Raymond Williams, Maurice Everett, Charles Poulson, Howard Gibson, Lawrence Belser, Roy Robinson, Petitioners v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Pa. Department of Probation and Parole, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Polite v. Pa. Department of Corrections

parties: Willie E. POLITE, Allen Ginn, Gregory Stover, Raymond Williams, Maurice Everett, Charles Poulson, Howard Gibson, Lawrence Belser, Roy Robinson, Petitioners v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Pa. Department of Probation and Parole, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of June, 2010, the Petition for Review, the Application for Summary Relief and the “Judgment by Default” are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
996 A.2d 1064
Willie E. POLITE, Allen Ginn, Gregory Stover, Raymond Williams, Maurice Everett, Charles Poulson, Howard Gibson, Lawrence Belser, Roy Robinson, Petitioners v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Pa. Department of Probation and Parole, Respondents.
No. 20 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 24, 2010.
